title: Gemini File Search Builder
description: Build permanent Gemini File Search RAG knowledge bases from any website. Get unlimited AI queries with automatic citations. Actor fees: $0.02 start + $0.0015/page (Store discounts up to 30%). Additional costs: Apify scrapers + Gemini indexing (see README for full breakdown).

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape and index

corpus_name.title: Knowledge Base Name
corpus_name.description: Unique name for your knowledge base (e.g., 'python-docs', 'company-wiki'). Helps you identify it when querying or managing multiple stores.

gemini_api_key.title: Gemini API Key
gemini_api_key.description: Your Google Gemini API key (from aistudio.google.com). IMPORTANT: Use the SAME key you'll use to query the knowledge base later. File Search Stores are tied to the API key that created them.
